data.name: Ele-Mental
data.detailed_description:
Ele-Mental offers a fast paced exciting one of a kind gameplay experience, perfect for local multiplayer or solo fun!
Switch Ele-Ments at the press of a button, dodge opposing Ele-Ments while absorbing those that match.

Game Modes

  • 100 Progressively challenging missions.
  • 50 Survivals, from Casual to Ninja Pro. Doubled with Relentless mode.
  • 10 Survival Decathlons.
  • 10 Arcade Machines, each with 8 rounds. (Can you perfect them all) (I Can't)
  • Creator Mode, create your own Missions and Survivals using all of the games mods and enemies.
  • Little Ele-Venture, text based story adventure. Can you do the thing? (Normal and Hardcore)
  • Free Party Mode - Unlocks all Missions, Survival, Arcade and Creator in Competitive play, allowing for an untested number of players in a tournament.

Game Features

  • 1-4 player co-op on everything above.
  • Steam Leaderboards for Survival, Missions, Arcade and Story modes.
  • Pure co-op, for 2 or 4 players you are restricted charging Ele-Ments so you must rely on your team mates. (Available on everything)
  • Pure Competition, 6 games with mods for competitive play outside of Free Party.
  • Dynamic Soundtrack evolves as you absorb.
  • DJ Booth, 1-4 players each with a song from the game can remix all of the music. (This can get messy, Sync button recommended)
  • 14 Skins, 11 to unlock as you earn XP during play.
  • Ele-Medals. Like Achievements, but you get a little medal and some coins when you earn them. (Also Steam achievements)
  • Stats. Ele-Ments absorbed, Enemy types absorbed, Games played, Mistakes made, coins earned, Fireworks purchased and More.
  • Personal stats, Name your self, choose a skin, rack up XP and Absorbs and see how long you've been playing.
  • 129 Things to unlock.

data.short_description: Ele-Mental Fast paced arcade action.Charge your Ele-Ments, absorb your enemies.One of a kind gameplay, great for up to 4 players. Earn Hypal Coins, spend unlocking game modes and mods. Become a true Ele-Mentalist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Mid range
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mid range dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional.
  • Additional Notes: Try the demo to be sure.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro
  • Processor: Top Range
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Top Range
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you have one already, use it.
  • Additional Notes: We recommend the best PC you can get your hands on.
